meta.source_provenance: Email from noreply-public@digital-policing.co.uk to Ben Carter on 2024-11-04 (issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon, Sussex Police)

emails.subject_summary: Jonathan Dixon requires your assistance in a police investigation
emails.body_raw:
You have been requested by Jonathan Dixon, a Police Officer or member of Police Staff, to provide data to assist with a police investigation/enquiry.
Please click here to respond to this request. The link will expire on 18/11/2024.
emails.body: Evidence-portal request sent to Ben Carter via Digital Policing, issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon, Sussex Police.

sentence_tags.text: The link to the request will expire on 18/11/2024.
sentence_tags.notes: Sets a hard deadline for evidence submission (18 November 2024).

contradiction_links.claim: Police provided clear, reliable access to evidence submission.
contradiction_links.reality: Portal link tied to case 47240214305 was time-limited and risked expiring if not actioned within 14 days.

events: Digital Policing portal request issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon (case 47240214305).

damages_summary.emotional: Added stress due to repeated intake requests from different named officers.
damages_summary.strategic: Risk of missed evidence submissions or confusion about intake responsibility.
damages_summary.reputational: Potential framing as non-cooperation if link expired unused.
